text: Exactly what I was looking for. Code reviews are mundane without the ability to insert a Pikachu GIF at will.
Thank you very much for this great extension. I'm now the most popular code reviewer in the team. Everybody wants me to review their PRs because of the fun GIFs I'm adding to the review comment :)

I basically can't do my job well without this extension, so thank you. Though whatever the current github-changed-something bug prevents me from selecting the "suggestion" button, so I had to disable it temporarily. Is there some way we can track an issue or a whatever to know when the fix has come thru?
Giving this 5 stars because it's been a joy to use so far! However, it looks like GitHub might have made a change that breaks the placement of the "GIF" button in the comment box.
I can now properly express myself in pull requests and issues on GitHub. How did I manage before?
Before I got this extension I was weak. Now...
Works perfectly. And very fast. Cool!

I do not see the Gif button...

Tried to insert in my README.md after installation of git extension.
https://github.com/EvaMalinina/todo-list-react-hooks/blob/main/README.md
I love it, works as advertised
This had a 5 star from me until it stopped working. It doesn't show the GIF button anymore. Once this is fixed, I'll bump it back up to 5 stars.
Neat! Save me so much time to add gif for my pull request. love it!
How much time have I wasted looking for the perfect GIF to attach to my pull request? That's a thing of the past now. 🙌

Sooo much easier to add GIFs in my Github pull requests now. It does exactly what you want it to do, not more not less. Why open a new tab when you can do it RIGHT THERE ON THE PULL REQUEST. GiFabulous extension!!!! GIFs for Github or a gift for Github from the coding gods. Its the small things in life. A++

I used to struggle to adequately communicate my concerns or jubilations about my code reviews. This all changed when I discovered this extension. No context switching, no endlessly searching for a gif and forgetting why I was in the first place. From within the GitHub Pull Request comment box I can quickly add a gif and truly express how I feel about the code. Simple and easy. Thank you!!
Flipping premium time saver right here. This extension is a must have for any and all github users 👍
